name: Build Back Better
description:
Made for 2023 GGJ

Current world affairs inspired the game.

It is a cookie-clicker game that aims to show the need for cooperation between people to create a better world. You are part of a tribe that gathers nutrients to maintain and help the tree grow.

The graphics are hand drawn on actual paper!

Gather nutrients to help the tree and use your sole resource to get more help and help the workers to gather the nutrients to help the tree grow!
